name: HydraPlant
description:
You are a plant with extraordinary growth speed! But it seems your home is a deep and dark pit...
Try to make your way out! Whenever you hit something you get to start over from the middle of your last stem, but be careful since the side your grow out from is random!

Controller (recommended)

Steer - Left/Right direction on Joystick or D-Pad
Boost - A/X or Bumpers
Restart - Y/△

Keyboard

Steer - A/D or Left/Right Arrows
Boost - Space
Restart - R
